doc.repnme: The new operators in Peruvian small towns : designing a sustainable management model for water and sanitation services
doc.abstracts: In most of the small localities of Peru, the municipalities offer direct water and sanitation services, and make decisions based on the service format and quotas. In regard to localities, the pilot project to improve water and sanitation for small towns (PPPL) has been instituted. This paper has the following headings: introduction; background; service in small towns; a new management model with specialized providers; a new role for the municipality, ordinances, and special providers; characteristics of the contracting for special providers; the creation of a market for special providers; and the difficulties encountered in the pilot project.
